text: Mihaela Buzărnescu was the defending champion, but lost to Daria Kasatkina in the first round. Zheng Saisai won her first WTA singles title, defeating Aryna Sabalenka in the final, 6–3, 7–6(7–3). == Seeds == The top four seeds received a bye into the second round. == Draw == ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ===Bottom half=== == Qualifying == === Seeds === === Qualifiers === ===Qualifying draw=== ====First qualifier==== ====Second qualifier==== ====Third qualifier==== ====Fourth qualifier==== == External links == * Main draw * Qualifying draw Category:2019 US Open Series Category:2019 WTA Tour 2019 Singles
title: 2019 Silicon Valley Classic – Singles
